_sText:
Hello
here is my first hosties map 

my map has many features such as:
gun toss; s4s; 4 cells; race; ring teleport; secrets;5 security cameras; Simon says wall; 32spawns (16ct and 16t); alarm; headcrab; women; weapon dispenser (m4a1 & deagle; door code is: upright; downright;upmiddle; downmiddle and left) and simon says box

btw simon says box idea belongs to Westsid3r

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_s2dTnwBQ2w


---------------- v2
added buyzone for cts
bigger ct and t spawn

---------------- v3
The simon says box kills anyone who tries to use it. FIXED
U can open the jails from inside if u crouch and press the jail button. FIXED
